interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NuPeptin Calming Facial Scrub exfoliating scrub that cleanses and immediately helps to give your skin a smoother and softer appearance.
Review Date: 2016/10/23
Store: Nupeptin
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6 x 2 x 0.3 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '727510007168', 'Manufacturer': 'Supportiback'}
Review Text: This is a really nicely balanced facial scrub. There are plenty of exfoliating beads so you actually feel like you are scrubbing your skin. However, they are contained in an emollient base with Jojoba oil, sunflower seed oil, and vitamin E  so that it doesn't feel very harsh at all. I did not detect much of a scent and the overall experience was calming yet effective. After rinsing, I felt my skin was prepared to receive skincare product. A little goes a long way. Highly recommend.
Review Title: This is a really nicely balanced facial scrub
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
SKEDERM EXHYDRO Ceramide Complex Moisturizer, Intensive Repair and Hydration Daily Face Cream, 50ml BBInfinite {'Brand': 'BBInfinite', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.77 x 2.17 x 3.74 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SKSF004-050'} The Skederm ExHydro Ceramide Complex Moisturizer is great for facial skin that needs moisture but not necessarily a heavy duty cream. I found the consistency to be light and silky and almost undetectable on my skin after it absorbed. My skin just felt hydrated and bouncier. For my dry skin, I usually like more emollient creams for night time use. I found this cream perfect for daytime worn under an SPF cream and foundation or a BB cream. I use it in place of a serum and it acts like a makeup primer, blurring lines and pores and making skin appear smoother while adding a dose of hydration. Not a lot is needed. I use four small dots to cover my entire face. From what I can tell it is also color and fragrance free.

The key ingredient that attracted me to this product is the Ceramide Complex consisting of Ceramides I, III, VI and natural ingredients (palm oil, algae extract, and fig extracts) that act to hydrate and firm skin. The Skederm ExHydro Ceramide Complex Moisturizer also has glycerin and silicone derivatives in it to increase water retention and give your skin a silky feel. I love that it is supplied in a tube. It's not fancy, but it is very convenient and hygienic. This Skederm product is made in Korea which has been at the forefront of cosmetics and skincare research in recent years. The Skederm ExHydro Ceramide Complex Moisturizer is great for facial skin that needs moisture but not necessarily ... Myconos Magic BB CC Moist Air Cushion Compact Korean Cover Foundation SPF50+ with 1 Extra Refill Luminous Glow Shade 21 {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Sun Protection': '50 SPF', 'Package Dimensions': '3.31 x 3.11 x 2.6 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '789655125510 763109545659'} Wow! What a luxurious, well-made cushion compact. This rivals the high-end one I purchased from Lancome a few months ago. The product came boxed with the ingredients listed. You're also getting a sealed refill cushion compact included in the box which is amazing for the price. The compact is made of a high quality white plastic. It's easy to open using a push button in the front. There's a good size mirror in the upper lid and a hinged plastic cover to prevent the cushion from drying out. You can hear a soft click when it's closed, so you know it's not going to open inadvertently. There's a Myconos branded applicator that rests on top of the cover.

The foundation I got (#2) works well with my NC20-25 skin. It's not a heavy foundation. I would consider it moderate coverage at best. It's very blendable and like most cushion compacts, feels very light on the skin. I included a picture which shows a heavy application on my cheek blended out towards the front of my face. Wear is very good. I haven't felt the need to reapply after using it in the morning. Like a lot of Korean cosmetics, the quality and cutting edge technology used is amazing. This is a fantastic deal especially since a refill was included. Gorgeous Korean made cushion compact plus refill. NuPeptin Calming Facial Scrub exfoliating scrub that cleanses and immediately helps to give your skin a smoother and softer appearance. Nupeptin {'Package Dimensions': '6 x 2 x 0.3 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '727510007168', 'Manufacturer': 'Supportiback'} This is a really nicely balanced facial scrub. There are plenty of exfoliating beads so you actually feel like you are scrubbing your skin. However, they are contained in an emollient base with Jojoba oil, sunflower seed oil, and vitamin E so that it doesn't feel very harsh at all. I did not detect much of a scent and the overall experience was calming yet effective. After rinsing, I felt my skin was prepared to receive skincare product. A little goes a long way. Highly recommend. This is a really nicely balanced facial scrub
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Type Preference:** Prefers lightweight moisturizers ideal for dry skin, especially suitable for daytime use.
- **Product Features:** Enjoys products with a silky, undetectable consistency upon absorption, particularly those that hydrate and smooth skin, and can serve as makeup primers.
- **Preferred Ingredients:** Attracted to ceramides and natural ingredients that enhance hydration and skin firmness, with interest in glycerin and silicone derivatives. Recently appreciated products that include soothing emollient bases like jojoba and sunflower seed oil.
- **Usage Preference:** Generally uses cream-based products either as standalone moisturizers or under makeup, favoring multifunctional products that act like serums for additional skincare benefits.
- **Packaging Preference:** Values hygienic and convenient packaging, favoring tube formats over jars and appreciates well-designed compacts with refill options.
- **Brand Inclination:** Shows a preference for Korean products, recognizing the country's reputation for cosmetic and skincare innovation.
- **Scent Sensitivity:** Prefers fragrance-free products to avoid irritation and has recently favored calming formulations that do not have strong scents.
- **Review Behavior:** Tends to provide high ratings for products meeting specific skincare needs effectively. Recently experienced positive outcomes with facial scrubs that offer effective exfoliation while maintaining a gentle, calming experience. Values high-quality, innovative formulations that prepare skin for subsequent skincare steps.

Overall, this user seeks efficient, lightweight skincare and makeup solutions that provide hydration while enhancing cosmetic application, especially those that exemplify cutting-edge technology.
